entry.title: Tuesday night: A few clouds. Low minus 12 except minus 9 along the Fundy coast.
entry.summary: A few clouds. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 12 except minus 9 along the Fundy coast. Wind chill minus 9 this evening and minus 18 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM AST Tuesday 14 February 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: A mix of sun and cloud. High plus 4.
entry.summary: Mainly sunny. Increasing cloudiness in the afternoon. Wind becoming southwest 20 km/h in the afternoon. High plus 4. Wind chill minus 16 in the morning. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM AST Tuesday 14 February 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: Chance of showers. Temperature rising to 7 by morning. POP 30%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 30 percent chance of showers. Fog patches overnight. Wind southwest 20 km/h. Temperature rising to 7 by morning. Forecast issued 4:00 PM AST Tuesday 14 February 2023
